text: This obsoletes IRM 1.2.45, Servicewide Policies and Authorities, Delegations of Authority for Human Resource Management Activities.

This material in IRM 1.2.45 has been moved to IRM 1.2.2.7 Delegations of Authority for Human Resource Management Activities. All Delegation Orders contained in IRM 1.2.40 through IRM 1.2.54 were consolidated and moved to IRM 1.2.2, Servicewide Delegation Orders. This IRM has been updated to include the following revised delegation order.
